name: G-Max Vine Lash
effect: The Grass-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Overgrowth while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Additionally, deal 1 Damage against all foes at the end of each Round, grass-types are immune to this damage. Lasts 4 turns.
description: The user creates two giant vines to attack the opponent, trapping it in a field full of vines.
